response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,200,000. My objective is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, hence I believe this price strikes a fair balance between its worth to you and my valuation of it. I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you, aligning perfectly with your goals and enhancing your portfolio. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and making this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 1200000}
